items.title: Prediction: These 3 Healthcare Stocks Will Soar in 2025
items.description: Here's why they chose Amgen (NASDAQ: AMGN), Eli Lilly (NYSE: LLY), and Summit Therapeutics (NASDAQ: SMMT).  David Jagielski (Amgen): Shares of Amgen started crashing in late November following the release of data from a phase 2 clinical trial for its weight loss candidate, MariTide.
